item.title: What case would i put fletching under?and are these codes right?
item.dc:creator: @352scape 352scape
item.description:
@352scape wrote:

like heres the code i jus need to know which case to put it under

else if(useItemID == 1513 && atItemID == 946) // fletching { if(playerLevel[7] >= 1); sendMessage("You Cook and Get Some fletching Exp!"); addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[7]), 7); deleteItem(1513,getItemSlot(1513), 1); addItem(70, 1); }

[code]else if(useItemID == 1777 && atItemID == 70) // attaching string to bow
			{
			if(playerLevel[7] >= 1);
                            sendMessage("You Cook and Get Some fletching Exp!");
                            addSkillXP((25*playerLevel[7]), 7);
                            deleteItem(70,getItemSlot(70), 1);
                            deleteItem(1777,getItemSlot(1777), 1);
			addItem(859, 1);
			}[/code]

i think those are right i jus wrote em up like 1 min so show me how to fix anywayswhat they are supposed to do is when u use kknife on mage log gives u mage longbow(U) then bowstring on mage longbow(U) u get mage longbow thanks for ur help if u do =]!
